title: Portfolium
description: Portfolium features a dynamic color palette with shades of blue (#287A9F) for trust and innovation, a vibrant red (#E72429) for passion and energy, and a warm orange (#F68E20) for creativity and enthusiasm. These colors reflect the brand's commitment to dynamic learning experiences and are sourced from their comprehensive 2023 brand guideline guide found on the Instructure's official resource page.
